entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then light snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
